overview: Lil' Gaither, This Little Light is the second release int the Gaither Growing Series and presents more wonderful music for you and  your children to enjoy. This DVD will captivate you lil' one's attention and spark his or her imagination. Featuring: Special skits by The Three Little Wooden Guys, new interactive segments with Bullfrog, and a NEW segment called "Guess What I Am?", that will have your child laughing and learning at the same time. Also featuring, special music by some of your Homecoming favorites such as Jeff and Sheri Easter, The Isaacs, Ricky Skaggs, Buddy Greene and many more! Songs: 1. Bluegrass Breakdown 2. Keep on the Sunny Side 3. This Little Light of Mine 4. Singing In My Soul 5. O Come Angel Band 6. Jonah and the Whale 7. Lima Beans 8. He Ain't Never Done me Nothin' But Good 9. Rawhide
title: Lil' Gaither: This Little Light
